section.p: If you like, your college will hold possessions and money here for safe-keeping. Record in the box anything that you wish to leave here. Each time you return, .

outcomes.outcome: Your possessions and money are safe
College fees mean that 10% of money left here has been deducted

section.p: You can also reside in college for as long as you wish, making use of the infirmary if need be. (If injured, restore your Stamina to its normal unwounded score.)
